biotools.summary:
TCRdb: A comprehensive database of T-cell receptor sequences in various conditions.

TCRdb contains more than 277 million highly reliable TCR sequences from over 8265 TCR-Seq samples across hundreds of tissues/clinical conditions/cell types. The unique features of TCRdb include:.
